entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
